page.title: 17THE FAMILY OF DONNA
page.content: Each morning I am awakened by my Mom. My dad has already gone to work. He works for British Oxygen as a driver of an articulated lorry.He works five days a week and some Saturdays.My Mom cleans at a club.She also works five days a week.My brother married last year so he does not live at home any more.I am interested in Tennis so I go to the club near my home.I go to school to be educated during the week.I start at 9a.m. and work till 3.45p.m.My Mom is always in the house before I reach home but my Dad arrives later. My family likes holidays abroad.We have been to a lot of places. Sometimes we go to my uncle's restaurant.He is Italian and lives in Penarth,South Wales.He gives us free meals. In our spare time we watch television or read.
